Quick Reference:

Patient: NHS, HN, NS, Name, Coder, Consent, Date
LM: Light Microscopy: CM, C2M1, etc.
Glom: Glomeruli: 31, Gs7, Ss1_NOS, Mm1, Mc1, G2, Cg1
TI: Tubulointerstitium: ATI_micro, IFTA20, T1, etc.
Ves: Blood Vessels: A3, 2IL_1Ar, Cv2, V0, Ah1, Ptc1
IHC: Immunohistochemistry: C4d0, SV40_0
EM: Electron Microscopy: EM0, EM1
IFFR: Immunofluorescence: FR_0, FR0
CONCLUSION: BL, MVI+, MildIFTA, etc.
COMMENT: MVI+, DP, NR, etc.
